column1: #Text=The tax applies to all foreign money so isn't the same as the Head tax.
#Text=BC does have a shameful history of racism.

#Text=The head tax, the race riots of 1907, the internment of Japanese Canadians (a Federal decision hugely influenced by BC politicians) - followed by the restriction of Japanese Canadians from returning (and even voting) until 1948.It's also pretty fair to say that there is a component of racism in the criticisms of rising housing prices with all Chinese being painted by the same brush.
#Text=Read some of the comments in stories about BC real estate to see examples - it's pretty overt from certain posters.
#Text=Even the CRA's lame excuse that they didn't want to be accused of racism by doing their jobs is pathetic - reverse racism.
#Text=(Note: I don't believe this excuse for a second.
#Text=CRA was just incompetent and lazy and are now using 'race' as an excuse).
